extendedInfo.description: IMPORTANT!This is a old version of TweetTopics. You can install TweetTopics 2.0 for Google Play NOW!==========TweetTopics is a Twitter client skilled to advanced searches in this social network.You can perform the common actions you do on Twitter and also customize your searches to the maximum by selecting the language to translate the tweets, to filter messages that only have pictures or video, view messages received or sent by an user, to filter by geolocation, etc.. You can also notify the search results, share and more.Features skills:- Update your Facebook status- Preview photos and videos without close de app.- Thumbnails of pictures and videos links.- Notification of mentions,  direct messages and searches.- Multiaccount: Quick swap user accounts.- Widget.- Autocomplete usernames.- The most complete Twitter search Engine.- Save tweets to read later.- Translate tweets to other languages.- Geolocation tweets.- Local Trending Topics.- ADW Launcher integration.You'll can do things you can not do in TweetDeck, Twicca nor Plume.If you want some new features only just comment to me at @tweettopics_app.

reviews.title: My kinda app
reviews.comment: I dont know what you can say bad about this app yea sure it dose not update u cant connect to twitter and its mostly a waste so u should install this :p

reviews.title: Inquiry
reviews.comment: What happens when tweet topics 2 becomes available...will this app gets trashed? I tried downloading tweet topics 2 hoping it\'s gonna be better but it wont connect to twitter...pls fix so i\'d be able to try and recommend it. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User
